info.description: Personal finance tracking API for managing accounts, transactions, budgets, and more.
info.title: Fortuna API

get.description: Get all financial accounts for the authenticated workspace

post.description: Create a new financial account (bank, cash, e-wallet, or credit card)

get.description: Get total outstanding balance across all credit card accounts

put.description: Update an existing financial account's name

get.description: Get all API tokens for the authenticated workspace (JWT auth only)

post.description: Create a new API token for programmatic access (JWT auth only)

delete.description: Revoke/delete an API token (JWT auth only)

get.description: Get budget allocations and progress for a specific month

post.description: Creates a CC payment (income on CC account, optional expense on source bank account)

get.description: Get aggregated spending data for future months including projections

parameters.description: Number of months to include (1-24, default 12)
parameters.name: months

get.description: Get financial summary including balances, disposable income, and projections
Generate a presigned URL for temporary access to a private S3 image
get.summary: Get presigned URL for an image

post.description: Generate presigned URLs for multiple private S3 images in a single request
post.summary: Get presigned URLs for multiple images

get.description: Get all loans/installments for the authenticated workspace

parameters.description: Filter by status: active, completed, all
parameters.name: status

get.description: Retrieves all recurring templates for the workspace

post.description: Creates a new recurring template with projection generation

get.description: Retrieves a single recurring template by ID

put.description: Updates a recurring template and recalculates projections

delete.description: Deletes a recurring template and all its projections

post.description: Atomically settles CC transactions and creates a transfer transaction from source bank account

get.description: Get paginated transactions with optional filters

parameters.description: Filter by month (YYYY-MM format, overrides startDate/endDate)
parameters.name: month

parameters.description: Filter by CC status (pending, billed, or settled)
parameters.name: ccStatus

post.description: Create a new income or expense transaction
Toggle multiple CC transactions from pending to billed in a single request
post.summary: Batch toggle CC transactions to billed status

get.description: Get CC metrics (pending, billed, month total) for the current or specified month

parameters.description: Month in YYYY-MM format (defaults to current month)
parameters.name: month

get.description: Returns all billed, deferred CC transactions that need settlement, grouped by month
Returns CC transactions that are billed but overdue (2+ months), grouped by month

patch.description: Update only the amount field of a transaction (for overdue items)
Toggle the billed status of a CC transaction (pending <-> billed)
Toggle the paid/unpaid status of a transaction

outstanding.description: Sum of billed CC transactions with deferred intent (balance to settle)

purchases.description: Sum of all CC transactions (pending + billed + settled)

isModified.description: true if projected instance differs from template

isProjected.description: true if this is a projected (not yet actual) transaction

templateId.description: ID of recurring template that generated this

BearerAuth.description: For JWT: "Bearer <jwt_token>". For API tokens: just enter "fort_xxx" (Bearer prefix optional).
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
